Text:
How great is this. To bad she's dead but it's no wonder this woman was known as "La Reina de la salsa".
Digame por favor si tienes mas musica de AmĂŠrica Latina ;-)
Muchas gracias amigo!!!!!

Celia Cruz was, without a doubt, the Queen of Salsa. Her voice is both melodious and sensual while, at the same time, conveying the joy of the music and the beat. Great artists like Celia come along once in a while and, like another great, Tito Puente, leave us too soon wanting more.
